name: Funny Shoot Bubble Pop Game
description:
Funny Shoot Bubble Pop is the most classic and amazing shooting candy buster game.
Funny Shoot Bubble Pop is so simple, but not easy to play well.
Make combinations of 3 or more candies to make them burst. Clear all the candies to level up.
How to play - Don't use the arrows on the bottom, just tap on the game board where you want the candy.
Click the menu key to set options

Game Features:
1. 500 fun levels of puzzles
2. Six difficulty level
